🌟 Conference Update from our CEO! 🌟
Our CEO, Alex de Lorraine, recently had the privilege of participating in a captivating conference centered around the ever-evolving realm of global investments.  🌍 This distinguished event delved deep into the current landscape of investment opportunities, providing invaluable insights into emerging trends and cutting-edge strategies within the industry.  Not only did Alex have the chance to engage actively with industry experts, thought leaders, and fellow professionals, but the conference also presented unparalleled networking opportunities. These interactions paved the way for in-depth discussions on potential collaborations and strategic partnerships that could shape the future of our company.  Stay tuned as we leverage these learnings to drive innovation and growth! 💼✨
Thank you, Community Days in the Bahamas, courtesy of IANUA Market Limited!IANUA Market LimitedC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-ElbeufAnna ArpilledaIta HodderRafael CosmanJohn CostantiniMichael G. BlandDiana BushardBill WolfJagoda Anusiewicz#investment#globalinvestments#networking#thoughtleadership#partnerships#innovation#companygrowth#archblock

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf, shared insights on the power of web3 in democratizing financial access withCrypto News. "Web3 is changing the game by introducing unparalleled scalability, transparency, and efficiency," he emphasized.

Very interesting podcast with our CIO ,Bill Wolf. 
Always great to listen to Bill, his insights and his expertise.
The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,592 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf, takes the stage today at the Middle East Family Office Investment Summit for his insightful presentation during the "What's the Next Big Thing" segment. Prepare for an engaging discussion that promises to be enlightening and inspiring.#MEFamilyOfficeSummit#DubaiAdventures#InvestmentInsights#NextBigThing

Touchdown Dubai! 

Excitement is in the air as we prepare for the Middle East Family Office Investment Summit. 

Our CEO,C. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf, looks forward to presenting on Wednesday and participating in such an exciting and packed program. If you're at the Summit, we welcome the chance to connect with you and share insights. 

Drop us a message to arrange a meetup and be part of the conversation shaping the future of investments! Let's make this summit unforgettable.#MEFamilyOfficeSummit#DubaiAdventures#InvestmentInsights

Are you ready for the Investment Summit on Tuesday? 

We're gearing up for an incredible 2-day event at the Middle East Family Office Investment Summit in Dubai! 

We look forward to meeting and connecting next week at the Middle East Family Office Investment Summit, which more than 100 single-family offices from the region are scheduled to attend. 

Drop us a message if you would like to meet in Dubai!#MEFamilyOfficeSummit#InvestmentInnovation#CountdownToDubaihttps://lnkd.in/dqQpS_CG

Mark your calendars on 5 and 6 December 2023 for the 10th edition of the Middle East Family Office Investment Summit in Dubai. Get ready to chart the future with Archblock and the most innovative leaders in the industry!

Our CEO,C. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf, and co-founderRafael Cosman, are both honored to sponsor and attend the Middle East Family Office Investment Summit. This prestigious event, taking place in Dubai from 5-6 December, represents a melting pot of ideas and innovations in the investment realm. We are excited to be present and actively contribute as sponsors, underscoring our commitment to shaping the future of investment.

We would be thrilled to meet and connect with you if you plan to attend the Summit. This Summit presents a fantastic opportunity to explore the future of finance, gain valuable insights, and witness innovative ideas. Take the chance to catch our CEO, Alex de Lorraine's insightful presentation in the 'What's the Next Big Thing' segment, scheduled for Wednesday, 6 December. We look forward to sharing thoughts and forging new connections! 

Take advantage of this opportunity to meet with industry leaders and explore new possibilities!

Learn more here:https://lnkd.in/dqQpS_CG#MEFamilyOfficeSummit#InvestmentInnovation#CountdownToDubai

Our commitment to safety and security is unparalleled.

Alex will be diving into insightful discussions about the future of blockchain, stablecoins, and alternative assets. If you're attending the event and wish to explore potential collaborations or simply chat about the latest industry trends, don't hesitate to connect. Let's make the most out of this exceptional gathering!#Token2049#BlockchainConference#ArchblockInSingapore

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

"Stablecoins are set to revolutionize money transfer systems, offering efficiency and cost-effectiveness 🚀. The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈. 

Read the full article here:https://bit.ly/3YxoIe1#Stablecoins#BlockchainInnovation#FinancialRevolution#Archblock

Archblockreposted this CEO & Founder, Crypto Coin Show - Award Winning Podcast & Interview Host | Reuters | YouTube | Blockchain Founder & Investor Sometimes during my interviews I come across someone so knowledgeable in the financial space that I wish the discussion would go on forever.Bill Wolfwas one of those people.

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

I had to pick his brain on everything from different types of future financial instruments, CBDC's, how stablecoins should be backed, the USA vs China financial innovation war, if LatAm may see more Bitcoin and Web3 banking updates, and more.

Out of all of my interviews this month, I recommend you listen to this one the most. Here it is below:https://lnkd.in/dDjT28E9#interview#Web3#Banking#Investment

On July 10,Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock, spoke withAshton Addison, CEO and Founder of Crypto Coin Show, about tokenization and Web3 infrastructure, stablecoins, and the global credit system. Watch the full interview here:https://lnkd.in/g6pJJyHg

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

825 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

We are looking forward to attending theSuperReturnInternational Conference in Berlin next week.Monica Ho, CFA, Director of Capital Formation atArchblock, will be speaking on the Alternative Assets Meet Blockchain panel at the Disruption and Innovation Summit at 11:15am on Tuesday, June 6th. 

Please reach out to us atir@archblock.comif you would like to schedule a meeting with us at the conference.#superreturninternational#blockchain#alternativeassets

In collaboration with our cofounding partnersArchblockand#TrueCoin, we are proud to announce the successful deployment of#TUSDon theWatr Protocoldevelopment network, Watr Devnet. This is a significant step toward bringing additional asset-backed stablecoin liquidity to thePolkadotecosystem, and Watr in particular. 

We are now inviting developers to utilize the TUSD stablecoin to build DApps on the Watr Devnet and experiment with the stablecoin’s functionality, deploy stablecoin-based dApps, test its integration with other applications, and its potential for use in their own projects.

To learn more, pls visit the Watr media and Archblock medium pages. To build, visit the Watr Devnet.ArchblockTrueFi DAOWeb3 FoundationParity TechnologiesC. C.Trovio GroupMany thanks to our partner organizations and leaders for the seamless collaboration in bringing this to life:C. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf,Krzysztof Jelski,Gautam Dhameja,Thaddeus White,Ben Rounds,Clint Nelsen, @teresaCorey Wendling,Niall Mooreand many more 🙏Monica Ho, CFAZach CavanaughColleen MurrayPeter Ruchatz

The opportunity to create a diverse environment starts with our recruitment approach and process. We encourage applicants with diverse backgrounds across various industries and functions to apply for roles. 

We’re hiring! Check out our open roles:archblock.com/about#DEI 17,308 followers Learn about practical steps you can take to foster greater diversity in this byline fromLuke Fitzpatrick.https://lnkd.in/dFtwuQwY

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output:
The posts fall into the following themes:

1. Technological Advancements: They discuss blockchain technology's impact and wallet types.
2. Enterprise Adoption: They focus on how businesses integrate blockchain technology.

They are educational about technology and strategy, not focused on regulation or market predictions.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify key influencers or accounts whose posts are most engaged with or have a significant following in the cryptocurrency space. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key influencers in the cryptocurrency space with significant engagement and following include Gary Gensler, Brian Armstrong, Sam Altman, and Brad Garlinghouse, as recognized by CoinDesk's 2023 list for their impact on digital assets and Web3.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts for the most frequently used keywords and hashtags related to cryptocurrencies. Discuss their relevance and potential implications. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The keywords #blockchaintechnology, #Ethereum, #Solana, and #blockchain emphasize the tech focus in crypto, hinting at a strong interest in the mechanics and adoption of blockchain rather than market speculation or regulatory aspects.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not offer insights into investor behavior, concerns, or expectations regarding cryptocurrencies; they focus on blockchain technology in finance and wallet security.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any posts that may contain misinformation or speculative claims about cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no posts provided to review for misinformation or speculative claims about cryptocurrencies. The context given is factual and does not include any posts or content to evaluate.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends focus on blockchain integration in financial services to improve customer engagement and competitive advantage. No new developments, controversies, or milestones are mentioned; the emphasis is on blockchain's transformative potential in finance.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no patterns or strategies in the posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes; the content is purely informational.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: None of the provided context posts show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts; they are legitimate and informational.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: There are no invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups in the provided context, and the posts are informational and educational about blockchain technology, not related to manipulation schemes or investment advice.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts cannot be categorized based on cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior as they are educational about blockchain technology and enterprise adoption, not focused on investment or market trends.

overall_prompt_summary: The outputs pertain to the security assessment procedures for Frax Finance by Trail of Bits and a smart contract audit by Fairyproof. The assessments involve static code analysis, manual review, and dry run scenarios to identify and address vulnerabilities. The most critical issues revolve around identifying coding bugs and verifying them, as well as documenting and improving response plans for potential security incidents. The frequency and thoroughness of dry runs are emphasized to ensure the team develops a robust response to security threats. Potential improvements include creating templates for documenting necessary enhancements post-audit and increasing the regularity of dry runs for likely scenarios.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,668 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,683 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

Archblockreposted this VP, Asia Pacific & CEO Australia at Archblock I Stablecoins I Asset Tokenization This 40 minute panel discussion at the Hong Kong Web3 Festival could have gone for so much longer! We skipped the usual stablecoin 101 and jumped right into the meaty topics of use cases of stablecoins beyond crypto trading and navigating the evolving regulatory landscape. 

An absolute delight to moderate this panel with such an amazing crew:
Rita Liu,RD TechnologiesRaagulan Pathy,CirclePaul Kremsky,CumberlandJordan Dunne,WalletMore exciting developments to come in the following months and years on the stablecoin front, watch this space!Archblock

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Register for the side event we are hosting, Aleph Zero Petite Summit, here:https://lu.ma/petitsummitCome stop by our booth in the Main Hall or send us a DM if you would like to schedule a meeting to learn more about Archblock Stablecoins!

We are straight in and kicking off the relationship with an exciting Panel atParis Blockchain Week. TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,719 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,729 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

Ao possuir uma loja online em Portugal, é importante estar ciente das regulamentações locais e cumprir as leis específicas do comércio eletrónico. Aqui estão algumas práticas que deve evitar, pois podem ser consideradas ilegais ou inadequadas:

- 𝗩𝗶𝗼𝗹𝗮𝗰̧𝗮̃𝗼 𝗱𝗲 𝗗𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗶𝘁𝗼𝘀 𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗶𝘀 𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗱𝗮𝗱𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗮𝗹: Evite utilizar imagens, textos ou outros conteúdos sem a devida autorização, ou licença. Respeite os direitos autorais e propriedade intelectual de terceiros.
- 𝗙𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗱𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗰̧𝗼̃𝗲𝘀 𝗟𝗲𝗴𝗮𝗶𝘀: Certifique-se de incluir informações legais obrigatórias no seu site, como política de privacidade, termos e condições, informações fiscais e detalhes de contacto.
- 𝗙𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗮 𝗱𝗲 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗲̂𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗮 𝗻𝗼𝘀 𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗰̧𝗼𝘀: Seja transparente sobre os preços dos produtos, incluindo impostos, taxas de envio e quaisquer custos adicionais.
- 𝗣𝗼𝗹𝗶́𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘀 𝗱𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘂𝗰̧𝗮̃𝗼 𝗲 𝗥𝗲𝗲𝗺𝗯𝗼𝗹𝘀𝗼 𝗽𝗼𝘂𝗰𝗼 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗿𝗮𝘀: Evite políticas de devolução e reembolso vagas ou enganosas. Forneça informações claras sobre como os clientes podem devolver produtos e obter reembolsos.
- 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗶𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗼 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝘂𝗹𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗼 𝗚𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗹 𝗱𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰̧𝗮̃𝗼 𝗱𝗲 𝗗𝗮𝗱𝗼𝘀 (𝗚𝗗𝗣𝗥): Cumpra as disposições do GDPR ao lidar com dados pessoais dos clientes. Isso inclui obter consentimento para processamento de dados, fornecer acesso aos dados e garantir a segurança das informações.
- 𝗜𝗴𝗻𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗿 𝗮𝘀 𝗟𝗲𝗶𝘀 𝗙𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗶𝘀: Cumpra as obrigações fiscais, incluindo a cobrança e pagamento adequados de impostos sobre vendas.

Um bom checkout é essencial para o sucesso de um e-commerce. É a etapa final do processo de compra, onde os clientes concluem as suas transações e fornecem informações pessoais e financeiras. Aqui estão algumas dicas sobre a importância de um bom checkout num e-commerce:

- Experiência do utilizador: Um checkout intuitivo e simples melhora a satisfação dos clientes e evita o abandono de compras.
- Segurança: Um checkout seguro é essencial para proteger as informações pessoais e financeiras dos clientes.
- Opções de pagamento: Oferecer diversas opções de pagamento aumenta a conveniência e atende às preferências dos clientes.
- Custos de envio: Exibir os custos totais, incluindo taxas adicionais, cria confiança e evita surpresas desagradáveis.
- Otimização para dispositivos móveis: Um checkout responsivo e adaptado para dispositivos móveis é essencial para atender à crescente demanda de compras por meio de smartphones e tablets.

Conhece a diferença entre Marketing Tradicional e Marketing de Conteúdos? 🤔

🚀 Marketing tradicional é uma abordagem clássica de divulgação de produtos e serviços cujo objetivo é alcançar um grande público por meio de canais como televisão, rádio, jornais e revistas. O marketing tradicional inclui diversas táticas, como anúncios em veículos de comunicação, outdoors, panfletos e eventos de divulgação.

🚀O marketing de conteúdo é uma estratégia que consiste em criar e partilhar conteúdo relevante e valioso com o público-alvo de uma empresa, com o objetivo de atrair e fidelizar clientes.

Concorda com a frase de Doug Kessler? Partilhe connosco nos comentários. 👇

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,742 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

It outlines the engagement goals, findings, and recommendations for both short-term and long-term strategies. Key issues identified include susceptibility to transaction-reordering attacks, the non-production readiness of ABIEncoderV2, and inconsistencies in the k-dss repository. New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts are educational, focusing on staking for passive income, ecosystem health, and network updates. overall_prompt_summary: The prompts provided are designed to enhance productivity for professionals by leveraging ChatGPT's capabilities. They focus on cryptocurrency insights and fostering innovation in humanitarian efforts. Key issues include strategies for earning passive income through staking and the importance of community engagement in governance. Technological advancements and ecosystem health are also emphasized as critical for network sustainability. Potential improvements could involve more detailed case studies to illustrate successful applications of these strategies.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

On December 22, 2023, Governor Hochul signed the LLC Transparency Act (the “Act”) into law. Unless an exemption applies, limited liability companies (“LLCs”) formed or qualified to do business in New York on or before December 21, 2024 must report their beneficial ownership information to New York by January 1, 2025. If the LLC is formed or qualified after December 21, 2024, then reporting must be made with the LLC’s articles of organization or application for authority to do business in New York.

The Act’s requirements mirror those of the Corporate Transparency Act (the “CTA”), which is the new federal law that became effective on January 1, 2024 and which we previously summarized here. For example, a “beneficial owner” and an “exempt company” are defined by reference to the federal regulations under the CTA. However, here are some of the key differences. Click the link to find out what those differences are:https://lnkd.in/e-8fwnX4

What a wonderful shout-out to our team, includingMichael A. de Gennaro&Christian Henrichin a holiday poem from their client. 
A Rhyme for These Times

‘Twas the night before Christmas
 and all through the house
 not a creature was stirring,
 not even a mouse.

You see, those mice don’t like cellulose
 Not one little bit,
 And that whole house was well-insulated
 With CleanFiber dense-packed and snugly-fit.

The whole CleanFiber team
 Has been working hard all year
 To make the best damn product
 That our competitors fear.

To keep homeowners warm,
 CleanFiber’s production’s been cranking.
 Sales have been strong,
 And logistics deserves our thanking.

Accounting’s been trying
 To keep up with the action;
 While engineering is trying to avoid
 Jon’s distractions.

And our own Saint Nicholas & team
 Are dreaming up new potions,
 To make our cellulose flow
 According to their notions.

And our faithful lawyers at Woods Oviatt Gilman,
Rather than throwing in the towel
Have spent their weekends on documents
Without even calling "foul".

So whether you’ve been
 Naughty or nice,
 Outside these walls
 And in your personal life,

From all of us here
 On the CleanFiber team,
 I hope that Santa brings you
 All that you dream!

We are pleased to announce thatMichael A. de Gennarohas become a Partner in the firm, effective January 1, 2024.

Michael is a Partner in the Business and Finance Department. His practice focuses on the representation of domestic and international companies in corporate transactions. Michael's primary areas of practice are mergers and acquisitions, debt finance and project finance transactions, and other complex corporate matters across a broad range of industries, including manufacturing, transportation, oil, gas, and renewable energy, and financial services. Michael was previously the General Counsel at Keolis North America, the U.S. affiliate of the French railroad (SNCF), where he was responsible for a number of high-profile transportation procurements in North America, including Keolis's successful bid to operate and maintain the Massachusetts Bay Transit Authority's commuter rail lines in Boston.

Michael received his J.D. from Vanderbilt University Law School, and his B.A. from City College of the City University of New York, summa cum laude, Phi Beta Kappa. He is licensed to practice in the states of New York and Texas and in the District of Columbia.  To learn more about Michael's practice, click the link:https://lnkd.in/gdtzpXzm

Today we are highlighting Warren Rosenbaum, a partner atWoods Oviatt Gilman LLPin the Litigation Department and Practice Leader for the Business Litigation group at the firm. This year marks 50 years of practice for Warren and as an active member of the MCBA! 

When asked about his five decades of practice, Warren said: “Through my 50-plus-year connection with MCBA, I formed many lasting friendships and rewarding professional relationships as I served as a trustee, officer, committee chair and member. I attribute much of my professional success to the support, patience and understanding of my wife Pam Rosenbaum. A grateful thank you is also due to my many past and present partners and colleagues for their mentorship, guidance and support—to name just a few: John Liebschutz, Sandy Shapiro, Dan O'Brien, Jim McElheny, and Bill Bauer.”

Corporate Transparency Act Takes Effect January 1, 2024

 Executive Summary:
•  Starting January 1, 2024, your company may be required to report information on its “beneficial owners” to the U.S. Treasury Department’s Financial Crimes Enforcement Division (FinCEN).
•  Certain exemptions may apply, particularly for larger companies and regulated companies.  
•  “Beneficial owners” refers to individuals who exercise substantial control, or who own or control more than 25% of the company. 
•  The reporting deadline is January 1, 2025 for companies formed or registered before January 1, 2024. Companies formed or registered on or after January 1, 2024 must file beneficial ownership and formation applicant information within 30 days.
•  Non-compliance may result in strict civil and criminal penalties.

For more information click on the link below to read the alert in its entirety or contactKatarina Polozie, Esq. at (585) 987-2910 orkpolozie@woodsoviatt.comor, for tax-exempt organizations,Danielle Ridgely, Esq.at (585) 987-2914 ordridgely@woodsoviatt.com, or another member of the Business and Tax Department at Woods Oviatt Gilman LLP.https://conta.cc/47DUbin

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

"Stablecoins are set to revolutionize money transfer systems, offering efficiency and cost-effectiveness 🚀. The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈. 

Read the full article here:https://bit.ly/3YxoIe1#Stablecoins#BlockchainInnovation#FinancialRevolution#Archblock

Archblockreposted this CEO & Founder, Crypto Coin Show - Award Winning Podcast & Interview Host | Reuters | YouTube | Blockchain Founder & Investor Sometimes during my interviews I come across someone so knowledgeable in the financial space that I wish the discussion would go on forever.Bill Wolfwas one of those people.

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

I had to pick his brain on everything from different types of future financial instruments, CBDC's, how stablecoins should be backed, the USA vs China financial innovation war, if LatAm may see more Bitcoin and Web3 banking updates, and more.

Out of all of my interviews this month, I recommend you listen to this one the most. Here it is below:https://lnkd.in/dDjT28E9#interview#Web3#Banking#Investment

On July 10,Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock, spoke withAshton Addison, CEO and Founder of Crypto Coin Show, about tokenization and Web3 infrastructure, stablecoins, and the global credit system. Watch the full interview here:https://lnkd.in/g6pJJyHg

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

838 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

Register for the side event we are hosting, Aleph Zero Petite Summit, here:https://lu.ma/petitsummitCome stop by our booth in the Main Hall or send us a DM if you would like to schedule a meeting to learn more about Archblock Stablecoins!

The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,784 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,794 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

"Stablecoins are set to revolutionize money transfer systems, offering efficiency and cost-effectiveness 🚀. The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈. 

Read the full article here:https://bit.ly/3YxoIe1#Stablecoins#BlockchainInnovation#FinancialRevolution#Archblock

Archblockreposted this CEO & Founder, Crypto Coin Show - Award Winning Podcast & Interview Host | Reuters | YouTube | Blockchain Founder & Investor Sometimes during my interviews I come across someone so knowledgeable in the financial space that I wish the discussion would go on forever.Bill Wolfwas one of those people.

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

I had to pick his brain on everything from different types of future financial instruments, CBDC's, how stablecoins should be backed, the USA vs China financial innovation war, if LatAm may see more Bitcoin and Web3 banking updates, and more.

Out of all of my interviews this month, I recommend you listen to this one the most. Here it is below:https://lnkd.in/dDjT28E9#interview#Web3#Banking#Investment

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

853 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

In collaboration with our cofounding partnersArchblockand#TrueCoin, we are proud to announce the successful deployment of#TUSDon theWatr Protocoldevelopment network, Watr Devnet. We are now inviting developers to utilize the TUSD stablecoin to build DApps on the Watr Devnet and experiment with the stablecoin’s functionality, deploy stablecoin-based dApps, test its integration with other applications, and its potential for use in their own projects.

To learn more, pls visit the Watr media and Archblock medium pages. To build, visit the Watr Devnet.ArchblockTrueFi DAOWeb3 FoundationParity TechnologiesC. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,802 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈. 

Read the full article here:https://bit.ly/3YxoIe1#Stablecoins#BlockchainInnovation#FinancialRevolution#Archblock

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,849 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

New Listing: 1GBP  -  GBP backed stablecoin coming soon to Damex App & Damex Business

The 1GBP is a crypto stablecoin pegged to the British Pound Sterling. For every 1GBP token minted the organization behind this coin holds a pound with the Bank of England as a safeguarding mechanism.

It aims to provide a reliable and regulated method for digital transactions in GBP. The Sterling backed stablecoin is designed to offer the advantages of cryptocurrency transactions, such as speed and cost-efficiency while maintaining the stability of a fiat currency.

As a result, it is an attractive option for those seeking a stable digital currency that bridges traditional finance and the rapidly growing world of cryptocurrencies.

We are looking forward to attendingParis Blockchain Weekfrom April 9-11!Christian Walker, Chairman and Co-Founder ofStablecoin Standard, will be speaking on The Future of Commerce on Chain panel on April 10 at 5PM CET.

The future is Blockchain and we are so excited here inArchblockto be part of it!Archblock PolandAnna ArpilledaJagoda AnusiewiczC. C. Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,855 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

YouTube:https://lnkd.in/gZpN9SdpPodcast:https://lnkd.in/g2cHuXt9

Bill Wolf, CIO of Archblock spoke withMurtuza Merchantof Benzinga about the transformative potential of stablecoins in the financial landscape. As Chief Investment Officer at Archblock, Bill firmly believes that stablecoins will create 'The New Bedrock for How Finance Moves Around.'

"Stablecoins are set to revolutionize money transfer systems, offering efficiency and cost-effectiveness 🚀. The entry of major payment platforms like PayPal into the blockchain space is a clear signal that this technology is the future. This shift echoes the evolution from paper money to decentralized digital money."

At Archblock, we're thrilled to explore and promote this significant leap in financial history. While some market cannibalization might occur, it's an exciting growth phase for blockchain 📈. 

Read the full article here:https://bit.ly/3YxoIe1#Stablecoins#BlockchainInnovation#FinancialRevolution#Archblock

Archblockreposted this CEO & Founder, Crypto Coin Show - Award Winning Podcast & Interview Host | Reuters | YouTube | Blockchain Founder & Investor Sometimes during my interviews I come across someone so knowledgeable in the financial space that I wish the discussion would go on forever.Bill Wolfwas one of those people.

From working in Banking for 30+ years to investing in Web3 financial infrastructure, then realizing it's potential and becoming CIO ofArchblock, the very platform he had invested in to get him into Web3, he has experienced first hand just how much the banking world is changing.

I had to pick his brain on everything from different types of future financial instruments, CBDC's, how stablecoins should be backed, the USA vs China financial innovation war, if LatAm may see more Bitcoin and Web3 banking updates, and more.

Out of all of my interviews this month, I recommend you listen to this one the most. Here it is below:https://lnkd.in/dDjT28E9#interview#Web3#Banking#Investment

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

858 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors. 

Last week brought a wave of positive developments for digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Newsflow was led by the launch of EDX markets, a new cryptocurrency exchange backed by Wall Street institutions, whilst the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, filed for a Bitcoin ETF. Further, Fed Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged the ‘staying power’ of Bitcoin as an asset class, and in the UK, the first Parliamentary Bill (FSMB) regulating stablecoins and digital assets passed through the Upper House of Parliament.

These recent developments have added renewed interest and momentum to the asset class and make our upcoming Crypto & Digital Assets event on 29th June especially timely and relevant.#familyoffices#digitalassets#blockchain#cryptocurrencies

Alexander Boehnke de Lorraine-Elbeuf 2,864 followers On this week’s episode of the Inside Crypto podcast, we had the pleasure of speaking with Bill Wolf, the CIO ofArchblock. Bill shared his fascinating journey in the world of finance and technology, and how he believes blockchain technology is a major tectonic shift in the financial markets.

He shared insights into the two main sides of Archblock - a blockchain software provider that helps people create and manage stable coins, and an on-chain software to assist with asset management. From creating#TUSD, a base layer of institutional grade stablecoins, to developing True (TRU), a utility token that underlies the TrueFi base software, Bill’s journey is a testament to the transformative power of blockchain technology.

Don’t miss out on this insightful conversation. Check out the full podcast to learn more about Bill’s views on the future of blockchain technology and how Archblock is contributing to this major shift.

TUSD Announcement: In December of 2020, TrueCoin, LLC (a subsidiary of Archblock, Inc.) transferred ownership of TrueUSD (“TUSD”) to Techteryx, an Asia-based consortium. Techteryx brings to TUSD  significant resources and a vast global network to help the stablecoin scale and reach new untapped markets. As of July 14, 2023, the market capitalization for TUSD is in excess of $2.8B.  

Following the transfer of ownership in 2020, the Archblock team continued to support the TUSD business with operations, compliance, and a robust banking network during the transitional period. Effective July 13, 2023, Techteryx will fully manage all operations and services related to TUSD, including minting and redemptions, customer onboarding and compliance, fiat reserve banking relationships, and ongoing product development. New and existing customers will be able to access their TUSD accounts via the TUSD app. 

We wish the Techteryx team continued success with TUSD!

858 followers We look forward to welcoming leading managersFidelity Digital Assets,Aaro Capital,Archblock,ETC Group,Fineqia,Wave Financial Group,Goldfinchandhestiiaon 29th June in LDN as they showcase their investment opportunities to family offices across the Digital Asset space including Cryptocurrencies, Blockchain, Web3, DeFi and related sectors.
